lead_paragraph: The guardrail maker, which the Justice Department is investigating over its ET-Plus product, says it will turn over more than a decade’s worth of records.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; U.S. Subpoenas Trinity for Records on Guardrails
headline.main: U.S. Subpoenas Trinity Industries for Records on Guardrails

snippet: The guardrail maker, which the Justice Department is investigating over its ET-Plus product, says it will turn over more than a decade’s worth of records.
abstract: Trinity Industries says it has received Justice Dept subpoena seeking more than decade's worth of records on its guardrail products.
